testcase.name: Verify the verfication module is present or not
testcase.system-out: When Login in the healthapp application.....................................passed Given Scroll & click till "Verification" menu on the side bar...............passed Then Verify that the user is able to navigate to "Verification" section.....passed

testcase.name: Verify all sub-modules are displayed correctly after Clicking on the "verification" Module.
testcase.system-out: When Login in the healthapp application.....................................passed Given Scroll & click till "Verification" menu on the side bar...............passed Then Verify that the user is able to navigate to "Verification" section.....passed Then Verify that "Inventory" button is visible..............................passed Then Verify that "Pharmacy" button is visible...............................passed

testcase.name: Verify the presence of Requisition tab in inventory section with all fields.
testcase.system-out: When Login in the healthapp application.....................................passed Given Scroll & click till "Verification" menu on the side bar...............passed Then Verify that the user is able to navigate to "Verification" section.....passed Then Verify that "Inventory" button is visible..............................passed Then Verify that "Pharmacy" button is visible...............................passed And Click on "Requisition" under "Inventory"................................passed Then Verify these elements are visible on the page Requisition, Purchase Request, Purchase Order, GR Quality Inspection, Ok, print, First, Previous, Next, Last, view, search bar, Requisition Status, Date range, Pending, Approved, Rejected.passed

testcase.name: Verify to navigate on another sub module after open the inventory module
testcase.system-out: When Login in the healthapp application.....................................passed Given Scroll & click till "Verification" menu on the side bar...............passed Then Verify that the user is able to navigate to "Verification" section.....passed And Click on "Pharmacy" tab.................................................passed Then Verify that the user is able to navigate to "Verification/Pharmacy/" section.passed

testcase.name: Verify to navigate on another sub tab after open the Requisition tab
testcase.system-out: When Login in the healthapp application.....................................passed Given Scroll & click till "Verification" menu on the side bar...............passed Then Verify that the user is able to navigate to "Verification" section.....passed And Click on "Purchase Order" under "Inventory".............................passed Then Verify that the user is able to navigate to "Verification/Inventory/PurchaseOrder" section.passed

testcase.name: Verify to search the data by picking the date filter
testcase.system-out: When Login in the healthapp application.....................................passed Given Scroll & click till "Verification" menu on the side bar...............passed And Choose the date from Jan 2020 to March 2024.............................passed And Click on the "all" Radio button from List by Verification Status........passed And Click on OK button......................................................passed Then Verify that all the dates present inside the requested date are within the range.passed

testcase.name: Verify the tooltip and it's text present on hover the mouse on "Star"
testcase.system-out: When Login in the healthapp application.....................................passed Given Scroll & click till "Verification" menu on the side bar...............passed Then Hover on the star and Verify tooltip text as "Remember this Date"......passed

testcase.name: Verify dates are remembered correclty
testcase.system-out: When Login in the healthapp application.....................................passed Given Scroll & click till "Verification" menu on the side bar...............passed Then Verify that the user is able to navigate to "Verification" section.....passed And Choose the date from Jan 2020 to March 2024.............................passed And Click on tooltip button.................................................passed And Click on OK button......................................................passed And Click on "Pharmacy" tab.................................................passed And Click on "Inventory" tab................................................passed Then Verify that the date range remains the same............................passed

testcase.name: Verify data range by Select "one week" option from drop down
testcase.system-out: When Login in the healthapp application.....................................passed Given Scroll & click till "Verification" menu on the side bar...............passed Then Verify that the user is able to navigate to "Verification" section.....passed And Select 'Last 3 Months' option from the date range dropdown..............passed And Click on OK button......................................................passed Then Verify that all the dates present inside the requested date are within the range.passed

testcase.name: Verify following radio buttons are selectable:Pending, Approved, Rejected & All
testcase.system-out: When Login in the healthapp application.....................................passed Given Scroll & click till "Verification" menu on the side bar...............passed Then Verify that the user is able to navigate to "Verification" section.....passed And Click on the "pending" Radio button from List by Verification Status....passed And Click on the "approved" Radio button from List by Verification Status...passed And Click on the "rejected" Radio button from List by Verification Status...passed And Click on the "all" Radio button from List by Verification Status........passed

testcase.name: Create and Verify a Purchase Request in Inventory
testcase.system-out: When Login in the healthapp application.....................................passed Given Navigate to the Internal section under Inventory......................passed And Click on Purchase Request...............................................passed And Click on the Create Purchase Request button.............................passed And Fill in the required fields to create a Purchase Request................passed And Click on the Request button.............................................passed Then Verify that the Purchase Request has been successfully created.........passed

testcase.name: Verify Purchase Request in Verification Module
testcase.system-out: When Login in the healthapp application.....................................passed Given Navigate to the "Inventory" section under Verification................passed And Click on Purchase Request...............................................passed Then Verify that the status of the Purchase Request is "Pending" in the list..passed

testcase.name: Approve the Purchase Request and Verify Status
testcase.system-out: When Login in the healthapp application.....................................passed Given Navigate to the "Inventory" section under Verification................passed And Click on Purchase Request...............................................passed When Click on the View button under the action column for the Purchase Request..passed And Approve the Purchase Request............................................passed Then Verify the success message confirming the approval.....................passed And Click on the Approved radio button......................................passed Then Verify that the status of the Purchase Request has changed to Approved..passed

testcase.name: Verify Reject All button without filling remark field
testcase.system-out: When Login in the healthapp application.....................................passed Given Navigate to the "Inventory" section under Verification................passed And Click on Purchase Request...............................................passed When Click on the View button under the action column for the Purchase Request..passed And Click on Reject All button..............................................passed Then Verify a popup message should appear stating Remarks is compulsory for cancellation..passed

testcase.name: Reject the Approved Purchase Request and Verify Status
testcase.system-out: When Login in the healthapp application.....................................passed Given Navigate to the "Inventory" section under Verification................passed And Click on Purchase Request...............................................passed And Click on the Approved radio button......................................passed When Click on the View button under the action column with status approved for the Purchase Request..passed And Click on Reject All button with remarks.................................passed And Click on the Rejected radio button......................................passed Then Verify that the status of the Purchase Request has changed to Rejected..passed

testcase.name: Take Screenshot of the current page
testcase.system-out: When Login in the healthapp application.....................................passed Given Navigate to the "Inventory" section under Verification................passed And Click on Purchase Request...............................................passed Then Take screenshot of the current page....................................passed
